title: Asian FX to Benefit Most From Trump on Dollar, Strategists Say
description: President Donald Trump’s comments that he didn’t think the dollar had weakened excessively have accelerated a debate about a possible concerted move to depreciate the world’s reserve currency.
content: President Donald Trump’s comments that he didn’t think the dollar had weakened excessively have accelerated a debate about a possible concerted move to depreciate the world’s reserve currency.
